topic.title: Course Evaluation - Extra Credit
topic.text:
This is a reminder that your Fall quarter course evaluations are now live and will be available to your students until 12/4/2017. Students may access their surveys by logging into Canvas if your course has been published, or through the personalized link that has been sent to their Edmail inbox. 

Students who participate will receive a certificate of completion to their Edmail inboxes. You will receive an extra credit of 10 points maximum in exchange for the certificate.  Take a screen shot of your certificate and submit here (Week 11 - Course Evaluation - Extra Credit) for your extra credit.
